          <title>
            <string language="en">Chemical apparatus for measuring gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemischer Apparat für messende Gase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appareil chimique pour les gaz de mesure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrumento químico para gáses de medição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Apparecchio chimico per i gas di misurazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χημικές συσκευές για τα αέρια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aparato químico para los gases que miden</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations, showing the correct way for a pupil to draw some standard laboratory apparatus for measuring gases.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical apparatus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conical flask</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas jar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas syringe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">volume measurement</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die korrekte Methode
zeigend, damit eine Pupille irgendeinen Standardlaborapparat für 
messende Gase zeichnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de deux illustrations, montrant la voie 
correcte pour qu'une pupille dessine un certain appareil de 
laboratoire standard pour les gaz de mesure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações, mostrando a 
maneira correta para que uma pupila desenhe algum instrumento de 
laboratório padrão para gáses de medição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni, mostrando il
modo corretto affinchè una pupilla estraggano qualche dispositivo di 
laboratorio standard per i gas di misurazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων, που εμφανίζουν σωστό τρόπο 
για έναν μαθητή να σύρει μερικές πρότυπες εργαστηριακές 
συσκευές για τα αέρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones, mostrando la manera
correcta para que una pupila trace un poco de aparato de laboratorio 
estándar para los gases que miden.</string>
          </description>
